snippet: The police in Istanbul fired tear gas to disperse several hundred people protesting the police crackdown on antigovernment demonstrators earlier this year.
abstract: Police in Istanbul fire tear gas to disperse several hundred people protesting the police crackdown on antigovernment demonstrators earlier this year.
lead_paragraph: The police in Istanbul fired tear gas to disperse several hundred people protesting the police crackdown on antigovernment demonstrators earlier this year.

headline.main: Police in Turkey Act to Halt a Protest
headline.print_headline: Turkey: Police Act to Halt a Protest
